para.text: This function aim to check the tripping time of under-frequency protection.

The method of measuring the action time is: the frequency slips from the start value to the stop value, and waits for the protection relay met the trip condition. During testing, the stop value should be set slightly less than the action frequency setting of the protection relay to ensure the successful action tripping.

para.text: Maximum time of fault state automatically calculated by module.
An stable state after the variable slipped if no tripping met.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Defined the initial frequency on start. Usually is set to Fnom.
Defined start timing point of a particular frequency. Usually this value is the tripping frequency of the protection.
Defined the slip from start frequency to destination frequency. This value should less than the df/dt latch value of protection relay.
